entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Regina
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:41 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -12.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Regina Int'l Airport 07:00 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -12.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -14.4°C
Wind: NE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 14.
